desc: ABDB Designs is an award-winning studio producing custom furniture & interior decor for high-end commercial projects. Our patented design technique of embedding recycled wood in colored resin can be applied to any flat surface. All works are originally designed & handcrafted by our team in Union City, NJ.

layout.text: ABDB Designs blurs the lines between fine art and functional furniture, each piece features our patented technqiue of embedding recycled natural material in custom colored resin.
